entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
